component.name: ImageRotator
component.script:
sub init() ' List of your background images m.images = [ "pkg:/images/image1.jpg", "pkg:/images/image2.jpg", "pkg:/images/image3.jpg" ] m.currentIndex = 0
m.timer = createObject("roSGNode", "Timer") m.timer.repeat = true m.timer.duration = 10 ' Rotate every 10 seconds m.timer.observeField("fire", "rotateImage") m.timer.control = "start"
rotateImage() ' Show the first image immediately end sub
sub rotateImage() m.top.uri = m.images[m.currentIndex] m.currentIndex = (m.currentIndex + 1) mod m.images.count() end sub
